name: EPRI Open PQ Dashboard
short_description: The Open PQ Dashboard version 0.7 (BETA) provides visual displays to quickly convey the location of reporting devices and a count of alarms that have occurred at each location in the previous 24 hours.  It also provides a summary of the alarm counts for the previous 30 days.  Detail displays provide information about the alarm types, and trends based on hourly summary values. This version 0.7 of the software is fully operational with the included test dataset, and provides a framework for new functions and tools that will be included in a subsequent version 1.0 release.  This BETA version demonstrates new techniques for extracting information from large numbers of PQ data files, and gives the user the ability to become familiar with navigation and controls of the application.  Additional work is required to integrate datasets other than the supplied test data.
summary: Demos new techniques for extracting information from PQ data files
